DOC.brief_summary: Molecular analysis of the atheroma plaque. Screening for a novel biomarker of carotid status.
DOC.brief_title: Physiopathological and Therapeutic Value of microRNA in the Progression of Carotid Artery Plaques: Carotid Protocol and microRNA
DOC.criteria: Adults having to undergo carotid thromboendarteriectomy social security coverage provision of study information consent to participation. Previous carotid artery surgery refusal to participate in the study or inability to give consent.
